sentences.english: Living beings don’t create life, they re-purpose existing matter into offspring.
sentences.chinese: 众生不创造生命，他们用现有的东西重新繁衍后代。

sentences.english: All sentient beings have the ability to realize and actualize the Dharma, a completely pure state of being.
sentences.chinese: 所有众生皆可证入法，那样的境界是完全清净的。

sentences.english: If there are living beings who wish to see Amitabha Buddha in this lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 其有众生欲于今世见阿弥陀佛者。

sentences.english: Vow to be the earth that nurtures plants and cradles sentient beings.
sentences.chinese: 发愿作一方大地，普载众生，生长万物。

sentences.english: Disciple wishes to dedicate all merits to all sentient beings.
sentences.chinese: 弟子愿回向所有功德给所有众生。

sentences.english: Adam named his wife Eve, because she would become the mother of all the living.
sentences.chinese: 亚当给他妻子起名叫夏娃，因为她是众生之母。

sentences.english: If there are beings who hear this teaching, they should aspire to be born in that land.
sentences.chinese: 若有众生，闻是说者，应当发愿，生彼国土。

sentences.english: All living beings have the Buddha-nature; all can become Buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 一切众生，皆有佛性，皆堪作佛。

sentences.english: The Buddha, in order to tame certain beings, was once reincarnated as a brothel visitor.
sentences.chinese: 世尊在因地时，为度化众生而化现为一嫖客。

sentences.english: The work of aiding the world and saving the people is the duty of Buddha and Bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 济世救人，普渡众生是菩萨，是佛的工作。

sentences.english: Skeptical and dull living beings might ask that.
sentences.chinese: 多疑的钝根众生，也许会这样地问，可是呢？

sentences.english: Therefore, only when we attain Buddhahood, can we perfectly help all beings in the universe.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一定要成佛道，才能够广度九法界一切众生。

sentences.english: Uninhibited envy of any absurd dreams of living beings.
sentences.chinese: 任何荒诞不羁羡煞众生的幻梦。

sentences.english: Glorious refuge of sentient being, everywhere in the universe.
sentences.chinese: 有情众生的怙主，大千世界你无处不在。

sentences.english: Why the Buddha? Because Buddhas, Tathagatas, have cosmic bodies, and so enter into the meditating mind of each sentient being.
sentences.chinese: 所以者何？诸佛如来，是法界身，入一切众生心想中。

sentences.english: Like Tara, she took a vow to always be reborn as a woman.
sentences.chinese: 像度母一样，她发愿常转世为女身利益众生。
